review_data.title: comida boa e barata
review_data.content: pra quem estiver com pouco dinheiro e quiser comer com fartura, aconselho ir ao restaurant porte du soleil.

review_data.title: HOMEMADE!!
review_data.content: Very nice food, everything homemade. the chef is really nice and does everything with love. It has a splendid vue on the lake of zurich too.

review_data.title: quero voltar

review_data.title: Great place for families or groups
review_data.content: The restaurant is off the beaten track. Furthermore, it is located on the Sportanlage Sonnenberg i.e. within a sports club and therefore many visitors do not know that the restaurant is open to the public. The view is spectacular from there and when the weather...More
